subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: A.C. Milan took until stoppage time to salvage a draw at Portsmouth in the UEFA Cup on Thursday, missing a chance to join Manchester City, CSKA Moscow and St. Étienne in qualifying for the knockout round early.
snippet: A.C. Milan took until stoppage time to salvage a draw at Portsmouth in the UEFA Cup on Thursday, missing a chance to join Manchester City, CSKA Moscow and St. Étienne in qualifying for the knockout round early.
